title.rendered: Sugaring NYC – Sugar Hair Removal New York City.

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_height="yes" equal_height="yes"][vc_column]

[vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1563930433219{background-color: #ffdae4 !important;}"]

Book Your Appointment Online

It takes less than 2 minutes. Or simply call/text  1-888-647-8427.

.

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

I tried a full Brazilian sugaring at Sugaring NYC and now
I’m never going back to waxing  


[/vc_column_text]

[vc_row_inner gap="35" css=".vc_custom_1562796532229{margin-right: 10% !important;margin-left: 10% !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

Natural

The sugar paste is made of just three food grade ingredients: organic sugar, organic lemon juice and water.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

Hurts Less

98% of our clients report that Sugaring hurts less than waxing. No burns, no irration.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

Lasts Longer

The hair extracted in the direction of growth. eliminates breakage and ingrowns.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

[vc_column_text el_class="homePageH1"]

BOOK YOUR SUGARING SESSION

Book Online Or
Call/Text 1-888-647-8427

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="left-to-right"][/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1563113239965{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1563114935409{padding-right: 1% !important;padding-left: 1% !important;}"][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row wrap_in_container="yes" css=".vc_custom_1562799379613{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Most Popular Services

[/vc_column_text]

Brazilian Sugaring

One of our most popular procedures.

Body Sugaring

Treat yo' self to a full body deal... just in time for summer.

Underarm Sugaring

We make underarm hair removal especially generous.

Unlimited Sugaring

Enjoy Sugaring as often as you'd like with an unlimited membership.
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class="container"]

Our Dear Clients Say:

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1562799178650{margin-right: 7px !important;margin-left: 7% !important;}"][vc_column]

"

...this was my first experience with sugaring, and I definitely would like to continue more;) "

Irina Sharipova, Victoria's Secret Model

"

Daria is super clean and most important she takes her time, not like other places where they want to just wax large sections off and Daria is extremely precise and gets EVERY HAIR!

Dinorah R , Yelp.com

"

I will definitely be back again and again! Throw away your razors and go see Sugaring NYC.

Stephanie , Yelp.com
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

SUGARING NYC NATIONWIDE

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

FOR LOCATIONS IN OTHER STATES CLICK HERE
Sugaring Locations

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text]

Tag your "before" and "after" selfies with #gotsugar to get featured and receive a sweet surprise.
